mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of degree of comparison: Suleman’s youngest son is the most intelligent of all, My house is beautiful than his house, He is the happy person I know, She likes pizza better then her husband

options.a: Suleman’s youngest son is the most intelligent of all
options.b: My house is beautiful than his house
options.c: He is the happy person I know
options.d: She likes pizza better then her husband
